services.title: Our Financing Programs
services.sba_desc: Our U.S. SBA Loans provide government-backed funding up to $5 million for small businesses in Colorado and nationwide, with competitive rates since 2016. Ideal for expansion, real estate, or working capital needs.
services.term_desc: Our Term Loans offer fixed-rate financing from $25,000 to $500,000 with terms up to 5 years for small business growth, working capital, or debt consolidation, available to businesses across all 50 states with fast approval processes.
services.equipment: Our Equipment Financing team provides Full Market Value Lease or Equipment Financing Loans for up to 8 years at competitive rates.
